function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of UVC radiation due to virus concealment","Impact":"Incomplete disinfection and deactivation of viruses","Mitigation":"Use higher dosages of UVC radiation to compensate for virus concealment","Technologies":"UVC radiation at dosages ranging from 1000 to 3000 mJ/cm^2","People":"Passengers and crew on the aircraft","Owner":"Aircraft manufacturers and airlines"}]}
